item.title: How to Update
item.description: Check for outdated packages The npm outdated command will check the registry to see if any (or, specific) installed packages are currently outdated:

item.title: Troubleshooting
item.description: Problems updating npm packages Delete the ./node_modules folder, and run again: npm install Problems with cache Delete the temporary directories:
